entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as the target of silent giggles from other Slytherin girls and is later shouted at by Harry and Ron. She is also shown to be emotional, letting out a whimper and filling with tears.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as looking coldly at Hermione and handing down punishments to Harry and Ron. He is also shown to be able to hear the shouting of Harry and Ron but not exactly what they are saying.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as shouting at Snape along with Ron and later feeling injustice and wanting to curse Snape.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as shouting at Snape along with Harry and later being given a detention by Snape.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that will lose 50 points due to Harry's actions.

relationships.description: Snape scolds Hermione for something, but it is not specified what.
Harry defies Snape by shouting at him along with Ron.
Ron defies Snape by shouting at him along with Harry.
Gryffindor is punished by Snape due to Harry's actions.
